/usr/bin/c++ -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/simple_triangle.dir/simple_triangle.cpp.o -o simple_triangle  -Wl,-rpath,/home/djs/lvgl_osmesa_llvm6/build/mesa-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:/home/djs/lvgl_osmesa_llvm6/build/llvm-install/lib ../ext/dx8gl/libdx8gl.a -ldl ../mesa-install/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOSMesa.so ../llvm-install/lib/libLLVM-20.so -lpthread -ldl -lm
